actions.description: Use GET method to retrieve information about the specified resource.
actions.name: get

properties.description: The URI to make the request to. If HTTP Client Connection defines Base URI, then this value is appended to it.
properties.label: URI
properties.name: uri

properties.description: Download the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible.
properties.label: Allow Unauthorized Certs
properties.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts

properties.description: The format in which the data gets returned from the URL.
properties.label: Response Format
properties.name: responseType

options.description: The response is automatically converted to object/array.
options.label: JSON

options.description: The response is automatically converted to object/array.
options.label: XML

options.description: The response is returned as a text.
options.label: Text

options.description: The response is returned as a file object.
options.label: File

properties.description: The name of the file if the response is returned as a file object.
properties.label: Response Filename
properties.name: responseFilename

properties.description: Headers to send.
properties.label: Headers
properties.name: headers

properties.description: Query parameters to send.
properties.label: Query Parameters
properties.name: queryParameters

properties.description: Returns the full response data instead of only the body.
properties.label: Full Response
properties.name: fullResponse

properties.description: Follow non-GET HTTP 3xx redirects.
properties.label: Follow All Redirects
properties.name: followAllRedirects

properties.description: Follow GET HTTP 3xx redirects.
properties.label: Follow GET Redirect
properties.name: followRedirect

properties.description: Succeeds also when the status code is not 2xx.
properties.label: Ignore Response Code
properties.name: ignoreResponseCode

properties.description: HTTP proxy to use.
properties.label: Proxy
properties.name: proxy

properties.description: Time in ms to wait for the server to send a response before aborting the request.
properties.label: Timeout
properties.name: timeout
